title: Individual Activity - Peer Review the Enhancements to the User Interface

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this activity is to establish clarity about what the enhancements for the second major calculator project submission (Double Calculator with Square Root and FSM Error Messages) should be.

attachment: 07 Individual Activity - Peer Review the Enhancements to the User Interface.zip

questions.questionText: Summarize the Individual Activity - Peer Review the Enhancements to the User Interface
